description:
Sengoku, the former Admiral of the Fleet, and Great Adviser Tsuru discuss the murder of Vice Admiral T-Bone and concerns about Cross Guild. Meanwhile, Buggy gives a passionate speech to Crocodile, Mihawk, and his crew.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Go Get It! Buggy`s Big Declaration
Notre heure est venue. La déclaration de Baggy !
Schnappen wir es uns! – Buggys große Ansage
Tori ni Ikouze! Buggy no Dai Sengen
取りに行こうぜ! バギーの大宣言
